title: Chief Detective Kenichi
alternative_title: Ken-1 Tanteicho ; Kenichi Tanteicho ; ケン1探偵長 ; Chief Detective Ken-1
status: Ken-1 Tanteicho ; Kenichi Tanteicho ; ケン1探偵長 ; Chief Detective Ken-1
description:
Description :
        Kenichi is the chief detective of a boy's detective organization. With his assistant Donguri, a mynabird, Kenichi will face all sorts of cases all around the globe.---**Volumes 134 and 135 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Tornado Bomb Caper
